title: Add total profit display and introduction text

requirements.text: Calculate and display the total profit across all 5 markets by summing individual market profits. When Market 5 is set to 'Do Not Enter', its profit (₹0) should still be included in the sum. Display the total prominently with Indian Rupee (₹) formatting.

quotes: Display total profit across all markets

acceptanceCriteria: Total profit is calculated as the sum of all 5 market profits
Total profit updates automatically when any market's price selection changes
Total profit correctly reflects ₹0 for Market 5 when 'Do Not Enter' is selected
Total profit is displayed with proper Indian Rupee (₹) formatting using the existing formatCurrency utility
Total profit display is visually prominent and clearly labeled

requirements.text: Add an introduction section at the top of the page with the heading 'Introduction' followed by this exact text: 'You are the owner of an Indian leather manufacturing and export company producing premium leather shoes and belts. Your company operates in five different export markets, each with different cost structures and production capacities. In every market, you must choose a selling price. Demand depends on the price you select, and production is subject to capacity constraints. Some markets involve fixed operating costs, while others do not. In one market, you also have the option to enter or stay out. Your objective is to maximize total profit across all five markets. The goal is not to sell the highest quantity, but to carefully balance price, demand, cost, and capacity to achieve the highest overall profitability. Make your pricing decisions strategically and observe how they impact revenue, cost, and profit in each market.'

quotes:
also add intro text: Introduction

You are the owner of an Indian leather manufacturing and export company

acceptanceCriteria: Introduction section appears at the top of the page, above the market sections
Heading 'Introduction' is clearly visible and properly styled
All provided introduction text is displayed exactly as specified
Text is formatted with appropriate line breaks between paragraphs for readability
Introduction styling matches the warm leather-inspired design theme of the application

constraints: Use the existing formatCurrency utility function for Indian Rupee formatting
Maintain the warm earth tones color scheme (browns, tans, creams) consistent with the leather goods industry aesthetic
Do not modify the backend/main.mo file as all calculations remain client-side
Preserve existing market calculation logic and formulas
nonGoals: Adding export or download functionality for scenarios
Modifying the demand table or price points
Changing the existing market capacity or fixed cost values
Adding user authentication or data persistence
